name: The Pietà
description: The Pietà; Master of Sir John Fastolf (French, active before about 1420 - about 1450); or England; about 1430 - 1440; Tempera colors, gold leaf, and ink on parchment; Leaf: 12.1 x 9.2 cm (4 3/4 x 3 5/8 in.); Ms. 5, fol. 244v; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: The Pietà
medium: Tempera colors, gold leaf, and ink on parchment
